price: Au Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu ana wasichana, na nyinyi ndio mna wavulana?
footnotes: Ati Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye mwenye mabinti, kama mnavyo zua, na nyinyi ndio mna watoto wa kiume kama ndio mnavyo penda?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
